headline: China Reports New Cases of Mystery Virus, Raising Fears as Travel Season Begins
abstract: The spread of the pneumonialike illness to two other cities comes ahead of the Lunar New Year, when hundreds of millions will travel.
lead_paragraph: BEIJING â€” The authorities in China reported a third death from a mysterious virus and more than 130 new cases over the weekend, including ones found in Beijing and southern China for the first time. One new case was also reported in South Korea on Monday.
